definition: one by one/one after another
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
(idiom) fully displaying one's capabilities
bruised/riddled with scars
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
to have one's wish fulfilled
attitude/position (on an issue etc)
striving to be first and fearing to be last (idiom); outdoing one another
to damn/to curse/to revile

to leave the rails/to derail/to jump the track
to remain unmoved
